Name: Statue of Renenutet
Description: This statue depicts Renenutet with a human body and a cobra's head. She is the Lady of the Fertile Land and the Cobra Goddess of Corn. Renenutet is seated and her hands are resting on her knees. Her body is painted yellow and her wig is blue. She wears a necklace and a red dress decorated at the bottom with a double line. Two large cobras are engraved on the sides of her seat. The front and the sides of the base of the statue are engraved with hieroglyphics.
